name: Northstar Jet Neptune Aviation Services, Inc
about: Northstar Jet Flight School, part of Neptune Aviation Services, Inc., is dedicated to providing exceptional flight training built on a foundation of safety, trust, and education. With over 30 years of experience, our Part 61 flight training program offers flexibility for both part-time and full-time students. Our instructors, with over 7,000 hours of flight time, guide students from their first discovery flight to advanced certifications such as Private, Instrument, Commercial, and Flight Instructor. We utilize quality aircraft and state-of-the-art simulators to ensure comprehensive training. Whether you're flying for recreation or pursuing a career in aviation, Northstar Jet Flight School is committed to making your flight training affordable and tailored to your needs. We are here to help you take off and achieve your aviation goals.
services:
